features.name: UNC Path Configuration
features.description: Configure and save UNC network paths for folder storage, allowing access to network shares through the Evoq file system.
features.ui_location: Admin > File Management > Manage Folder Types > Add New Type > UNCFolderProvider
test_scenarios: Configure valid UNC path and verify connection
Configure invalid UNC path and verify error message
Configure UNC path with special characters
Test path validation for non-existent network paths

features.name: Multiple UNC Connections
features.description: Manage multiple UNC folder mappings simultaneously, allowing connections to different network shares.
features.ui_location: Admin > File Management > Manage Folder Types
test_scenarios: Delete specific UNC connection from multiple

features.name: Folder Mapping Management
features.description: Create, update, and delete folder mappings that connect Evoq folders to UNC network paths.
features.ui_location: Admin > File Management > Manage Folder Types
test_scenarios: Create new folder mapping with custom name
Verify folder mapping persistence after portal restart
Test special characters in mapping names

features.name: UNC Folder Operations
features.description: Perform folder operations (create, delete, rename, move) on UNC network paths through the Evoq interface.
features.ui_location: Admin > File Management > Digital Asset Management
test_scenarios: Create new folder in UNC path
Delete empty folder from UNC path
Delete folder with system files (desktop.ini, Thumbs.db)
Verify folder operations with mapped paths
Test folder operations with special characters
Verify error handling for folders with hidden files

features.name: UNC File Access
features.description: Access and manage files stored on UNC network paths through the Evoq file system.
features.ui_location: Admin > File Management > Digital Asset Management
test_scenarios: Access file with spaces in path
Test file access with network connectivity
Handle file access without network connectivity
Verify actual path resolution for files

features.name: Path Resolution and Mapping
features.description: Convert between UNC paths, Evoq folder paths, and relative paths for proper file system navigation.
features.ui_location: Backend functionality accessed through File Management
test_scenarios: Get actual path from folder info
Get actual path from file info
Get relative path from absolute path

features.name: Connector Configuration Status
features.description: Check and display the configuration status of UNC connectors to verify proper setup.
features.ui_location: Admin > File Management > Manage Folder Types
test_scenarios: Verify connected status with valid path
